content: Tags will apply to the room that will be created based on this template.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining how room tags will be applied when creating or editing a new room based on a template. The tooltip appears in a dialog component and helps users understand the behavior of room tags in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'سيتم تطبيق الوسوم على الغرفة التي ستُنشأ باستخدام هذا القالب' is a literal translation and could be phrased more naturally in Arabic. The phrase 'ستُنشأ باستخدام هذا القالب' is somewhat clunky. A more idiomatic translation might be 'سيتم تطبيق الوسوم على الغرفة التي سيتم إنشاؤها من هذا القالب' or 'سيتم تطبيق الوسوم على الغرفة بناءً على هذا القالب'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تطبيق الوسوم على الغرفة بناءً على هذا القالب.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is grammatically correct but sounds unnatural and overly literal. A more natural German phrasing would improve clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tags werden auf den Raum angewendet, der anhand dieser Vorlage erstellt wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'auf Grundlage dieser Vorlage' can be simplified and sounds somewhat formal for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tags werden auf den Raum angewendet, der mit dieser Vorlage erstellt wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Պիտակները կկիրառվեն այս կաղապարի հիման վրա ստեղծվելիք սենյակի համար:" is a bit literal and can be improved for clarity and naturalness in Armenian. The English phrase 'will apply to the room that will be created' is slightly awkward. A more natural Armenian phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պիտակները կկիրառվեն ստեղծվելիք սենյակի համար, այս կաղապարի հիման վրա:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct, but it could be more natural. '적용됩니다' (apply) sounds a bit formal and stiff in this context. A more conversational phrasing might improve the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 태그는 이 템플릿을 기반으로 만들어지는 룸에 적용됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ແມ່ແບບ' (mae-baep) is a standard translation for 'template', but depending on the context, 'ແບບຢ່າງ' (baep-yang) might be more appropriate. While 'ແມ່ແບບ' isn't *incorrect*, 'ແບບຢ່າງ' could be considered slightly more precise in some situations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ແບບຢ່າງ' instead of 'ແມ່ແບບ' for a potentially more precise translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Birkas tiks piemērotas telpai, kas tiks izveidota, pamatojoties uz šo veidni' is a bit literal and could be more naturally phrased. It implies the tags are actively 'applied' to the room during creation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Birkas būs saistītas ar telpu, kas tiks izveidota, pamatojoties uz šo veidni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the original translation is long and can be simplified for better readability in a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Birkas tiks saistītas ar telpu, kas izveidota pēc šī veidņa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tags zijn van toepassing op de kamer die op basis van dit sjabloon wordt gemaakt' is not a perfect equivalent of the English content. While understandable, it's a bit wordy and formal for a tooltip. A more natural translation might emphasize that the tags *are associated with* the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tags zijn gekoppeld aan de kamer die op basis van dit sjabloon wordt gemaakt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'templates' is misspelled. It should be 'template'.

The translation 'Etichete sunt aplicate la sala care va fi creată cu ajutorul acestui șablon' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of the English. It implies the tags are *actively* being applied, rather than being inherent to the room created from the template. A more natural translation would focus on the tags being *associated with* the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etichete sunt asociate cu sala care va fi creată cu ajutorul acestui șablon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'cu ajutorul acestui șablon' is grammatically correct, it's slightly awkward. A more concise and natural phrasing exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etichete sunt asociate cu sala creată pe baza acestui șablon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not the most natural way to express the meaning in Sinhala. A more common and easily understood phrasing would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සැකිල්ලෙන් නිර්මාණය වන කාමරයට ටැග් අදාළ වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Oznake će se primeniti na sobu koja će biti kreirana na osnovu ovog šablona.' is technically correct but could be more natural. 'Povezać' (to connect/associate) might be a better verb choice than 'primeniti' (to apply) in this context. 'Na osnovu ovog šablona' can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oznake će se povezati sa sobom koja će biti kreirana iz ovog šablona.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Etiketler bu şablona göre oluşturulacak odaya uygulanacaktır.' is a bit literal and could be more natural. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Turkish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etiketler, bu şablondan oluşturulacak odaya uygulanır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses a sentence. The Turkish translation also should be a sentence structure for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etiketler, bu şablondan oluşturulacak odaya uygulanır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is not entirely accurate. 'will apply to' is awkward in Vietnamese. The original emphasizes the *future* application based on the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thẻ tag sẽ được áp dụng cho phòng được tạo ra từ mẫu này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'được sẽ áp dụng' is slightly unnatural. 'sẽ áp dụng' is more common and flows better.
The word 'dựa trên' is a bit formal. While not incorrect, it might be softened for a more user-friendly feel.
